title: Luxuary House for Sale at Nittambuwa
details:
2 Story House architect designed,
Spacious modern type house situated in Nittambuwa Ranpokunugama On 11 Perch Land, 2725 sq ft. of house

- 200 m to Main Bus Road
- 30 minutes to Air Port.
-Certified Building plan
-Certified surveyor plan
-Clear Deeds

• - The house is completely tiled
• - 4 Bed rooms ( 1 A/C Room with Attach Bathroom & another 1 room with only attach Bathroom and a balcony)
• - 2 bathrooms with Hot water
• - Living Room with A/C , dining, modern pantry area
• - Kitchen with big area of space & granite finishing well designed pantry area
• - Finishing roof
• - Pipe born water with over head water tank
• - Calm & quiet highly residential area
• - Parking for 1 vehicle garage• -
• - 2725 Sq. Ft.
